name: Mega Golftroid
description:
[This game is in open alpha]

A metroidvania using golf based exploration and mega-style powerups 

This game is available for alpha testing. You will need to register and account, then click "send verification email", find that email (often in your spam/junk folder) and click the verification link. Once you have done that you may participate in the testing. 

There is a button located in game so that you can provide feedback... please provide lots!
